subtitle: description
body: As an Integration Consultant using business process engineering techniques, develops technical solutions and management processes to achieve overall objectives by means of implementing systems or enterprise-wide solutions, using the company's or a third-party's hardware/software products.
Develops and recommends solutions and strategies, based on the analysis of customer business goals, objectives, needs, and existing systems infrastructure.
Participates in sales and proposal presentations in addition to completing ongoing team account activities.
Identifies additional product/services opportunities in customer organization.
In general, customers view this employee as a consultant.
Performance is typically measured by delivery of agreed to solutions within budgeted hours.

subtitle: As part of Global Integration Team you will work with implementation teams to provide support around integration requirements for Kronos Products.
body: Resource communicates clearly and can develop and read specifications.
Acts as a mentor/coach to others on the Global Integration Team for integration best practices.
Work closely with Project Managers and Application Consultants, communicating and understanding goals required to complete required tasks on time and budget.
Designs, develop, modify, debug and evaluate tools developed to aid the Professional Service Teams.
Support development with tools and applications in other parts the professional services organization.
Ability to assist Sales, Presales, or Services teams with integration discovery and scoping.
Exposure to complex technology environments requiring a multi-product solution, as well as product integration and solutions.
Must be comfortable working with in a cloud environment.

subtitle: Qualifications
body: 3 + years' experience in a technical consulting environment.
Ability to assess, design, and develop integration for strategic large and/or very complex customers.
Ability to translate requirements into working solutions.
Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Information Systems or related field preferred.
Travel up to 25%.
Advanced knowledge of database querying, programming and web services, web transfer methods, file management, and cloud technology.
Development languages (.
NET, Java, JavaScript, JSON).
Development tools (for example source control, defect tracking tools, Postman, etc.
